item.title: Reboot
item.description: I amar prestar aen, Han mathon ne nen, Han mathon ne chae A han noston ned ‘wilith And again, my world is changing. A bit more than one year ago, I moved from a self-hosted blog built with Ghost to a fully managed website using Jimdo’s website construction kit. Sure, the effort for maintaining the full stack (server, os, database, web server software, etc.) has gone, and I certainly don’t want it back.
